overview:
Peter Granat is CEO of Cision North America based in Chicago. Cision is an international provider of PR software, media monitoring, distribution, and analysis services. Prior to relocating back to Chicago, Peter was based in London for two years as President for Cision Europe covering the Nordics, UK, Germany, France and Portugal. Before joining Cision, Peter was SVP of Business Development at MediaMap, a Warburg Pincus backed company that was acquired by Cision in 2003.

Peter graduated with an MBA from Kellogg and B.A. degree from the University of Vermont.
